adventurer.name: Adventurer
adventurer.description: Sometimes, it takes one brave soul to blaze a new trail for their whole company.

angel.name: Angel
angel.description: Give to someone whose benevolent presence is a heavenly blessing

artiste.name: Artiste
artiste.description: Give to someone who creates something artful and beautiful.

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: This prop is merited by your teammate who gave you perfectly-timed assistance that led to a positive outcome.

attention-to-detail.name: Attention to Detail
attention-to-detail.description: Give to your colleague with a really sharp eye for perfection down to the smallest details.

awesome-blogging.name: Awesome Blogging
awesome-blogging.description: Give to your colleague that really outdid themselves with an awesome blog post that demonstrated superb writing ability.

better-late-than-never.name: Better Late than Never
better-late-than-never.description: Give to someone who came through for you late but still did a good job.

birthday.name: Birthday
birthday.description: A token of appreciation for a co-worker on their special day.

bug-squasher.name: Bug Squasher
bug-squasher.description: Give to someone for squashing a particularly nasty bug or a large set of little bugs.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description: Give to your most resilient co-workers for overcoming difficult obstacles.

caffeination.name: Caffeination
caffeination.description: For that stimulating colleague that's always jacked up on coffee or simply has a ton of energy to share with others.

cat-wrangler.name: Cat Wrangler
cat-wrangler.description: Give to a "cat herder" for aligning disparate people or moving parts that otherwise would go off in many different directions.

cheerleader.name: Cheerleader
cheerleader.description: Give to that special someone on the team who knows how to cheer everyone on, even when the going gets tough.

cheerleading.name: Cheerleading
cheerleading.description: Give to that special someone on the team who knows how to cheer everyone on, even when the going gets tough.

class-act.name: Class Act
class-act.description:
Give to someone handles a situation with professionalism, class, and style.

Evolves from Good Taste.

cleanup-in-aisle-9.name: Cleanup in Aisle 9
cleanup-in-aisle-9.description: Give to someone that cleaned up someone else's mess.

coach.name: Coach
coach.description: Give to your personal or team coach for great instruction and motivation towards winning.

coffee-run.name: Coffee Run
coffee-run.description: Give to someone that made a coffee run on behalf of others.

comedian.name: Comedian
comedian.description: "From the moment I picked your book up until I laid it down, I was convulsed with laughter. Someday I intend reading it. " Groucho Marx

conductor.name: Conductor
conductor.description: Give to someone who controls every little nuance, beautifully, within a large project.

construction.name: Construction
construction.description: For a hard working colleague that really knows how to build stuff.

cooperation.name: Cooperation
cooperation.description: Give to someone who really understands the meaning of working together harmoniously.

cooperation1.name: Cooperation
cooperation1.description: Some points to get new players started on the right foot.

creativity.name: Creativity
creativity.description: A splash of color in the right place really goes a long way. Give this prop to a co-worker that demonstrated a flair for the creative in one of your projects.

customer-service.name: Customer Service
customer-service.description: A cornerstone of business success is making sure that your customer is happy and satisfied that you care deeply for their well-being. The recipient of this award knows how to make a customer feel good!

dad.name: Dad
dad.description: Give to someone for cleaning up around the office and being all motherly and stuff, handling the chores that nobody else wants to do like making sure the sink is empty.

decisiveness.name: Decisiveness
decisiveness.description: Give to someone who made a challenging decision decisively and quickly.

director.name: Director
director.description: Give to someone for directing a project successfully.

dj.name: DJ
dj.description: Award to someone that picked exactly the right track to play today, a real master of selection.

dreamer.name: Dreamer
dreamer.description: Give to someone who dares to dream.

dynamic-duo1.name: Dynamic Duo
dynamic-duo1.description: Give to an outstanding team of two who make an excellent pair.

early-adopter.name: Early Adopter
early-adopter.description: Give to someone for trying something new, promising, and useful.

early-riser.name: Early Riser
early-riser.description: Give to an early bird who arrives at work early, to catch the proverbial worm.

einstein.name: Einstein
einstein.description: Give these high-scoring props to someone whose great intelligence and originality evokes Einstein's genius.

everyday-i-m-hustling.name: Everyday I'm Hustling
everyday-i-m-hustling.description: Give to someone who's out there working new opportunities every day.

execution.name: Execution
execution.description: Give this award to someone who executed really well on a project or task that was assigned to them.

executioner.name: Executioner
executioner.description: You don't mess around. When you have a job to do, you bring down your axe on it with precision and power. You execute. You are the executioner!

experimenter.name: Experimenter
experimenter.description: Give to someone who carefully and scientifically tests innovative ideas.

extreme-focus.name: Extreme Focus
extreme-focus.description: Give this prop to a colleague that has shown a remarkable ability to focus, especially on small details that others might miss.

fairy-godmother.name: Fairy Godmother
fairy-godmother.description: You turned a pumpkin into a carriage and now Cinderella can go to the ball.

fashionista.name: Fashionista
fashionista.description: Give to someone who dresses to impress! These props are earned only by owners of the sharpest outfits in the company.

firefighter.name: Firefighter
firefighter.description: Give this award to someone that excels at putting out fires, you know, problems that threaten to bring down the entire company in a blazing inferno of trouble.

firewall.name: Firewall
firewall.description: Give to someone who helped to improve security of the company, its systems and processes.

flexibility.name: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Give to someone who bends over backwards to work well within constraints.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.description: Give these props to someone that knows when to hold 'em and when to fold 'em.

go-big.name: GO BIG!
go-big.description: Go Big or Go Home.  Winner mentality.  Give this to people who live big, dream big, think big and act big!

goddess.name: Goddess
goddess.description: Give this special award to someone who's demonstrated goddess-like powers of transcendence.

good-judgment.name: Good Judgment
good-judgment.description: Use this prop to memorialize a case of demonstrating good judgment in a situation that could have gone really badly.

got-it-done.name: Got It Done
got-it-done.description: In a busy environment filled with distractions and the pitfalls of multi-tasking, the recipient of this prop really showed that they know how to break things down by priority and get them done.

great-idea.name: Great Idea
great-idea.description: A half-baked idea is okay as long as it's in the oven. Give this award to your peer who came up with a great idea!

great-service.name: Great Service
great-service.description: Everyone wants something.  You provide everything.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: Give to someone who's making progress, slowly but surely.

guru.name: Guru
guru.description: A prop for a senior, well-respected member of your team. Give this one with care -- it imparts a great deal of honor (and points) on the recipient.

happy.name: Happy
happy.description: Gives this prop to someone for bringing happiness and cheer into the group!

happy-new-year.name: Happy New Year
happy-new-year.description: Wish someone great success in this new year.

heavy-artillery.name: Heavy Artillery
heavy-artillery.description: Sometimes, your standard firepower isn't enough. Give this prop to someone who brought out the big guns to get the job done.

heavy-lifting.name: Heavy Lifting
heavy-lifting.description: Give to someone who does the lion's share of something really difficult.

helpfulness.name: Helpfulness
helpfulness.description: Give to someone who's always on standby to help you in the toy workshop, toolbox in hand.

helping-hand.name: Helping Hand
helping-hand.description: Give this prop to someone that offered help at precisely the right time.

high-five.name: High Five
high-five.description: Give this prop when you want to high-five a colleague for a job well done.

home-run.name: Home Run
home-run.description: Give to someone for knocking it "out of the park," figuratively speaking.

honest.name: Honest
honest.description: Hard work and personality are nothing without trust. This prop is earned by those that have done something worthy of recognition for their display of honesty and integrity to the cause.

huge-heart.name: Huge Heart
huge-heart.description: Earned by your peers that really show how much they care by putting their heart into their work and relationships.

humble.name: Humble
humble.description: Humility is an under-appreciated quality these days and really makes for better relationships. Give these props to a colleague that has been humble when others might have taken offense or shown arrogance.

hungry.name: Hungry
hungry.description: The most successful people have a voracious appetite for knowledge and success. Give this prop to someone who can't get enough of the good stuff.

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Give to someone for going out and tracking down a new sales account. (Refers to "hunting and farming" as used in sales organizations.)

illumination.name: Illumination
illumination.description: Give to someone for bringing something to light.

it-s-alive.name: It's Alive!
it-s-alive.description: Give this prop to someone who improbably brought back a project from the dead or to someone who has just given birth to something amazing!

jetsetter.name: Jetsetter
jetsetter.description: Give to people that spend a lot of their work time flying around the world on business.

joyful.name: Joyful
joyful.description: A prop to give that special someone that fills your heart with indescribable joy.

keeps-on-ticking.name: Keeps On Ticking
keeps-on-ticking.description: Give to someone who perseveres and comes through even when things get rough.

kickoff.name: Kickoff
kickoff.description: Give when kicking off something new and exciting.

leadership.name: Leadership
leadership.description: Give to a valiant leader in your midst.

lifesaver.name: Lifesaver
lifesaver.description: Give to someone who just saved you from a lot of trouble.

linsanity.name: LINSANITY
linsanity.description: Give to a breakout star in the making who is just bursting with raw talent like Jeremy Lin!

loyalty.name: Loyalty
loyalty.description: Give to someone who's demonstrated steadfast loyalty to team and company.

lucky1.name: Lucky
lucky1.description: Give to someone who is gifted with good luck.

machine.name: Machine
machine.description: Give this prop to someone who powered through a tedious task "like a machine"

mad-scientist.name: Mad Scientist
mad-scientist.description: Give to a colleague that comes up with wild and crazy ideas.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: Give to someone who just made the impossible happen.

making-progress.name: Making Progress
making-progress.description: Give to someone who is evolving themselves or their project.

marathon.name: Marathon
marathon.description: Give to someone who crossed the finish line after many steps and a long exertion.

matchmaker.name: Matchmaker
matchmaker.description: Give to someone to thank them for giving you a personal introduction to someone you wanted to meet.

midnight-oil.name: Midnight Oil
midnight-oil.description: As in "Burning the Midnight Oil," give this prop to someone who stayed up really late to get a project finished. Originally refers to working by the light of an oil lamp or candle.

mom.name: Mom
mom.description: Give to someone for cleaning up around the office and being all motherly and stuff, handling the chores that nobody else wants to do like making sure the sink is empty.

ninja.name: Ninja
ninja.description: Give this high-scoring prop to someone who comes into a situation and quietly executes a difficult job with complete mastery and agility.

nonconformist.name: Nonconformist
nonconformist.description: For refusing to fall into line with the status quo.

office-expert.name: Office Expert
office-expert.description: This prop is earned by demonstrating a special knack for solving problems around the office.

originality.name: Originality
originality.description: Give to someone who expresses a unique approach to everything they do.

patience.name: Patience
patience.description: Give to someone who really practices the adage, "good things come to those who wait."

penny-pincher.name: Penny Pincher
penny-pincher.description: Give to someone who embodies the wisdom that a penny saved is a penny earned.

perseverance.name: Perseverance
perseverance.description: Give this prop (that looks suspiciously similar to Q*bert) to a colleague who knows how to persevere and keep trying to succeed in spite of plentiful obstacles.

persistence.name: Persistence
persistence.description: Give to someone that just won't give up! Illustration inspired by The Persistence of Memory by Dalí

plentiful-thanks.name: Plentiful Thanks
plentiful-thanks.description:
May the good things of life
be yours in abundance
not only at Thanksgiving
but throughout the coming year

poker-face.name: Poker Face
poker-face.description: Give to someone who is a great negotiator and really knows how to keep their cool with a straight face in challenging situations.

pragmatic.name: Pragmatic
pragmatic.description: Give to someone who is practical as opposed to idealistic.

preparedness.name: Preparedness
preparedness.description: For being prepared when others might have let it slide.

problem-solving.name: Problem Solving
problem-solving.description: Give this award as a "thank you" to your favorite problem solvers when they help you or your team. It says that the recipient of this award really demonstrated raw brainpower by getting to the root of a nasty problem and figuring it out.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: Give to someone who anticipates what you need and delivers it, no asking required.

punctuality.name: Punctuality
punctuality.description: Give to someone who delivers or shows up right on time.

quick-turnaround.name: Quick Turnaround
quick-turnaround.description: Give to someone who responds with a finished product when you'd barely finished asking

rainmaker.name: Rainmaker
rainmaker.description: Give these props to someone that really knows how to make money and success rain down!

revolutionary.name: Revolutionary
revolutionary.description: Give to someone who effects swift and significant positive change.

rockstar.name: Rockstar
rockstar.description: Rockstars in your organization make their job look easy and fun and fabulous all at the same time. Give this award to that special someone in your organization who is totally rockin' out!

rulebreaker.name: Rulebreaker
rulebreaker.description: Sometimes the most important rule for success is to know when to break the rules. Or at least bend them. Recognize a colleague that knew when to take that risk and make it payoff.

scientist.name: Scientist
scientist.description: Give for excellence in applying the scientific method to a problem: Methodical systematic observation, measurement, and experiment, and the formulation, testing, and modification of hypotheses and assumptions.

scribe.name: Scribe
scribe.description: Give to someone for a great piece of writing, or for note-taking in a meeting.

secret-agent.name: Secret Agent
secret-agent.description: Give to someone who gathers valuable intelligence.

secret-santa.name: Secret Santa
secret-santa.description: Give to someone who presented you with something delightful and unexpected.

secret-weapon.name: Secret Weapon
secret-weapon.description: Give to a teammate that saved the day by busting out skills almost out of nowhere.

self-starter.name: Self Starter
self-starter.description: Give to someone who does things on their own without being asked.

seppuku.name: Seppuku
seppuku.description: Give to someone when they handle a shameful situation with honor.

sherlock.name: Sherlock
sherlock.description: A special prop indeed, for the solver of a mystery that bedeviled others. Save this special prop for someone with a remarkable power of deductive problem solving.

showoff.name: Showoff
showoff.description: Didn't get props and thought you should have? No problem! Give these props to yourself to show off work that you're proud of. No points for getting the props, but likes and loves still work the way you expect.

shutterbug.name: Shutterbug
shutterbug.description: What a great shot! Recognize a colleague for their photography skills.

simplicity.name: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Breaking all the barriers of complexity. Simplifying and making things easy.

smooth-sailing.name: Smooth Sailing
smooth-sailing.description: Sometimes it pays to avoid making waves. Give this prop to someone who got their job done while steering clear of turbulent waters.

speed-demon.name: Speed Demon
speed-demon.description: Give to someone who's getting tasks done with unbelievable speed!

squidoo-gooder.name: Squidoo-gooder
squidoo-gooder.description: Says you are very deserving of special appreciation for all the great things you do on Squidoo.  This is an extra valuable prop for an extra valuable lensmaster!

superstar.name: Superstar
superstar.description: The recipient of this award has demonstrated superb strength of character and force of will. Give to the real super stars of your organization as a way of thanking them for going above and beyond normal human performance.

taking-a-bullet.name: Taking a Bullet
taking-a-bullet.description: Give to someone who put themselves on the line to rescue you from an undesirable fate.

teacher.name: Teacher
teacher.description: Give to someone that taught you something you didn't know before.

teamwork.name: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Give to those who working together showed that the whole is more than the sum of its parts.

thank-you.name: Thank You
thank-you.description: Give to someone when you want them to know how much you appreciate them

traffic-cop.name: Traffic Cop
traffic-cop.description: Give to a colleague that jumps into a busy situation and directs people to where they need to go and what they need to do.

uniqueness.name: Uniqueness
uniqueness.description: Give to someone who's truly one of a kind.

visionary.name: Visionary
visionary.description: Give to a leader of your group with unusually keen foresight.

welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.description: Give to someone to welcome them.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.description: Give to someone who works magic
